RelatedSentence: John Brumby , the former Labor premier of Victoria , says raising the rate or broadening the base of the GST is now inevitable .
Speculation about an increase in the GST above its present level of 10 per cent has been around since John Howard announced it during his first term .
The present round of GST speculation was sparked when the Abbott government , apparently without consultation , cut $ 80 billion in funding to the states for health and education spending .

A0: the states for health and education spending
RelatedSentence: At the end of last century , the states tied their fortunes to the GST by agreeing to axe many of their own taxes in exchange for all of the GST revenue .

A0: the only way forward for the states
RelatedSentence: As much as it needs to be inevitable from the states ' point of view , it 's not .
The Greens wo n't support it , so even if the Coalition were to take it to the 2016 election and win , it would need the support of Labor to get it through the senate .
